paper_abstract: The linear complete differential resultant of a finite set of linear ordinary differential polynomials is defined. We study the computation by linear complete differential resultants of the implicit equation of a system of n linear differential polynomial parametric equations in n - 1 differential parameters. We give necessary conditions to ensure properness of the system of differential polynomial parametric equations. (C) 2009 Elsevier Ltd. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Linear complete differential resultants and the implicitization of linear DPPEs
